name: Clock
body: Clock ---- A package for convenient access to high-resolution clock and timer functions of different operating systems via a unified API. * POSIX code and surface API was developed by Cetin Sert in 2009. * Windows code was contributed by Eugene Kirpichov in 2010. * FreeBSD code was contributed by Finn Espen Gundersen on 2013-10-14. * OS X code was contributed by Gerolf Seitz on 2013-10-15. ---- ## Contact [![corsis]](https://github.com/corsis/) [fusion@corsis.eu](mailto:fusion@corsis.eu) [corsis]: http://portfusion.sourceforge.net/i/l100.png "Corsis Research"
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
